template.name: Zookeeper-北京 模板
template.description:
Zookeper Monitoring Need this userparameter in zabbix_agentd.conf:
UserParameter=echo2nc[*],echo $1 | nc $2 $3

item.name: zookeeper 2181端口状态
item.description: 登录应用用户appuser，然后cd /app/zookeeper-3.4.9/bin；或ucashpay，cd /app/ucashpay/deploy/zookeeper/bin，执行./zkServer.sh start

item.name: zookeeper 进程状态
item.description: 登录应用用户appuser，然后cd /app/zookeeper-3.4.9/bin；或ucashpay，cd /app/ucashpay/deploy/zookeeper/bin，执行./zkServer.sh start

item.name: zk - Log file modify time(支付缓存)
zk - Log file modify time(运维)
zk - Log file modify time(渠道)
zk - Log file modify time(日志平台)
zk - $1
item.description: Number of connections to ZooKeeper that are currently alive.

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: zk_approximate_data_size is the approximate memory consumption for all znodes stored in the ZooKeeper ensemble

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: Maximum number of file descriptors allowed for the ZooKeeper process.

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: Number of file descriptors open by the ZooKeeper process.

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: Number of outstanding requests that need to be processed by the cluster.

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: Number of ZooKeeper network packets received by second

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: Number of ZooKeeper network packets sent by second

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: Number of watches currently set on the local ZooKeeper process.

item.name: zk - $1
item.description: zk_znode_count is the total count of znodes stored in the ZooKeeper ensemble. Every time a client creates a new znode, this counter will increment. Every time a client deletes a new znode (either explicitly or by dropping its ephemeral znodes after disconnection), this counter will decrement.

trigger.name: zk - Approximate Data Size is more than 1G
zk - Log file modify time is no change in 10 min (zk日志10分钟不刷新)
zk - Log file modify time is no change in 10 min (zk日志10分钟不刷新)
zk - Log file modify time is no change in 10 min (zk日志10分钟不刷新)
zk - Log file modify time is no change in 30 min (zk日志30分钟不刷新)
zk - Log file modify time is no change in 30 min (zk日志30分钟不刷新)
zk - Node have no alive connection

trigger.expression: ({Zookeeper:zookeeper[Open File Descriptor Count].last()}/{Zookeeper:zookeeper[Max File Descriptor Count].last()})>0.8
trigger.name: zk - Open File Descriptor near the Max File Descriptor
trigger.description: Open File Descriptor Count: {ITEM.VALUE1} Max File Descriptor Count: {ITEM.VALUE2}

trigger.name: zk - The avg client response latency is too large
zk - The leader has less than 2 followers
zk - The max client response latency is too large
zk - The outstanding requests is too large
zk - Watch Count is too many(50000+)
zk - Znode Count is Too many(300000+)
